content.rendered:
We Build The Credibility With Organic Certification.

SAPS is committed to offering organic certification services in accordance with recognized organic standards for organic certification.

Discover more

About Sustainable Agriculture Promotion Society

SAPS is the society registered under the Govt of Uttarakhand, for the organic and other certification and Organic promotion related activités.

SAPS operates under following product certification scheme(s)

  • Canadian Organic Standards (Product Regulation Compliance with the CAN/CGSB 32.310/ CAN/CGSB 32.311 General Principles and Management Standards and Permitted Substances Lists) Most Updated Version
  • EU 848/2018
  • USDA NOP (National Organic Program)
Know More

Start Your Certification Journey

Join us today to elevate your organic practices and unlock new opportunities.

BECOME AN ORGANIC CERTIFIED OPERATION

Step 1

Develop an organic system plan

Step 2

Implement the organic system plan. Have it reviewed by a certifying agent-SAPS

Step 3

Receive SAPS inspection

Step 4

Have a certifying agent-SAPS to review the inspection report

Step 5

Receive a decision from the SAPS certifier.

Start Your Certification Journey

Join us today to elevate your organic practices and unlock new opportunities.

Contact Us

SAPS Certification steps

Step 1

Requesting the organic certification application.

Step 2

Completing and submitting the application.

Step 3

Conducting a thorough review of the application.

Step 4

Carrying out an on-site inspection.

Step 5

Evaluating and reviewing inspection records.

Step 6

Making the final certification decision.

Step 7

Granting the official certification.

Step 8

Ensuring the continuation or renewal of certification.

Why Choose Us

Sustainability Starts Here

SUSTAINABLE AGRICULTURE PROMOTION SOCIETY (SAPS) is a non profit organization!

Building trust between individuals and organizations, enhancing organic certifications, and promoting a sustainable society are all part of SAPS Mission.

Our Goal is to collaborate with individuals worldwide in order to promote the credibility in implementation of organic standards and regulations in order to support the organic agriculture industry’s long-term, sustainable growth.

Fostering Trust in Organic Agriculture

Foster trust between individuals and organizations to strengthen the organic agriculture community.

Enhancing Organic Certification Credibility

Improve organic certification processes to ensure high standards and credibility.

Advocating for Sustainable Farming

Promote a sustainable society by advocating for environmentally friendly farming practices.

Global Collaboration for Organic Growth

Collaborate globally to support the long-term growth of the organic agriculture industry through strict adherence to organic standards and regulations.

Happy Customer

SAPS certification category

  • Crop Production -Individual farmer
  • Farmers Group / Grower Group
  • Processing Food
  • Processing Feed
  • Packaging and labelling/export/trading
  • Wild Crops
  • Animal Husbandry/Livestock
  • Organic Input approval
  • Apiculture
  • Sea salt and other salts for food and feed
  • Silkworm cocoon suitable for reeling
  • Natural gums and resins
  • Beeswax
  • Essential oils
  • Cotton, not carded or combed
  • Wool, not carded or combed
  • Plant-based traditional herbal preparations
  • Mushroom
  • Sprouts, shoots and microgreens production
  • Crops Grown in Structures or Containers
  • Others if any applicable for attestation of compliance

Client Success Stories

Hear from our partners about how SAPS has transformed their organic certification journey and opened new opportunities.

SAPS transformed our approach to organic certification, guiding us expertly through the process and helping us to expand our market reach. Their commitment to sustainability has significantly enhanced our farm's operations
Raj and PriyaGreen Essence Farm
Partnering with SAPS enabled us to navigate international standards with ease, opening up new markets for our products. Their focus on excellence and sustainability is truly commendable
Vivek SharmaNature's Bounty Organics
Working with SAPS has been a game-changer for us, offering more than just certification but a partnership in truly sustainable farming. Their support has been pivotal in transforming our practices.
Anjali MehtaEarthRoot Farms
